name: Goop Troopers
description:
Goop Troopers

Goop Troopers is a fast paced run and gun game in the style of Contra, Metal Slug, and Sunset Riders. Fight off the Goopman army as Ashley Matrix in a rescue mission.

Look out for classic weapons to help like the machine gun and the spread shot! Don't let Ashley get attacked by the Goopmen or she's in for a rough time!

FULL XBOX CONTROLLER SUPPORT - START CONFIRMS MENU

KEYBOARD - MENU UP/DOWN/ENTER GAMEPLAY: W/S/A/D and J/K

R restarts the game

The Public Preview Contains:

The Basics of Level 1-A

1 Animated Enemy with 1 sex scene implemented

1 WIP enemy

Spread Shot Power Up

Machine Gun Power Up - I think this is going to be tuned down it seems very overpowered!

I have been working on this project for a while now and am looking for support to keep it going.
